capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape does have that distinctive look to his nose. I've always thought it was a bit... striking. (smiling slightly)

Snape does have that distinctive look, doesn't he? I mean, his nose is quite... pointed. (pauses) It's almost as if it's been shaped by some sort of dark magic. (smirks slightly) But, you know, that's just Snape being Snape.

Snape does have that distinctive look, doesn't he? I mean, his nose is quite... pointed. (pauses) It's almost as if it's been broken at least once, the way it's hooked slightly to one side. (smirks slightly) Yes, Snape can be a bit intimidating with that nose of his.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape does have that distinctive look, doesn't he? I mean, his nose is quite... pointed. (pauses) It's almost as if it's been hooked, isn't it? capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've had my fair share of dealings with him, and let me tell you, he's a complex individual to say the least. His expertise in potions is unmatched, but his demeanor can be quite intimidating at times.
